description: This file contains a React component for a Jira OAuth callback page. It handles the OAuth redirect response, displays success or error messages, and redirects the user accordingly.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main component that wraps the OAuth callback logic within a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Inner component that processes URL search params, displays status, and handles redirection after OAuth attempt.
